text: Music from Another Dimension! is the 14th studio album by American hard rock band Aerosmith. The album was released on November 6, 2012. It was the group's first studio album of new material in 11 years. There are 15 songs on the album, although some special editions contained extra bonus songs. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2012 albums Category:Aerosmith
title: Music from Another Dimension!
